__e: You said that Son here could have...
I heard you say that you are not afraid of life or of death.
When you heard me say "poison," you knew instantly... your husband could have only been killed one way.
I heard her yelling and then... I just caught a quick look at her as she ran down the hall.
Well, I didn't want to say, but just not so long back now... I heard her screaming like a stuck pig.
I heard her screaming and ran... but he had already passed away.
I heard you on the phone to Sam.
I've never heard you talk like this before.
Nor I her. But I heard her sing such a strange song.
Because all I can say is, I never heard her sing half as well, as long as I am coming here.
He's been dead from the moment he heard you sing.
My friend heard it on the radio.
I heard her sing last Christmas.
Ensure our voice is heard at all levels of government.
I heard you moving around the kitchen.
That's the wildest line I've ever heard in my life.
We heard this song in the village where we were.
